column2: "<%me>! What happened to [Profound Darkness]?"
"Yeah, I thought so... I can't sense anything either."
"But we definitely stopped it... right!?"
"While this isn't exactly \"all's well that end's well,\" we did manage to hinder its materialization."
"Xiao!"
"I'm glad I came in person. The data alone wouldn't have picked up on this."
"...Severe traces of time travel, that is."
"[Profound Darkness] halted before it could fully revive..."
"...and then [Persona], whom I detected for no more than a split second..."
"Do you know what it all means, Xiao?"
"...<%me>... Matoi... What I'm about to say may be painful to hear."
"Are you sure you want me to say it?"
"1. Please tell us."
"2. Let Matoi decide."
"...Yeah. I want to know what happened, too."
"I... want to know. Please tell us what happened, Xiao."
"...Very well."
"Please be aware this is merely hypothesis based on the known facts. With that in mind, here it is:"
"The combined power of ARKS succeeded in preventing the corruption of Naberius."
"When the battle weakened [Profound Darkness], its host, [Persona], resurfaced..."
"...and without hesitation, [Persona] invoked their power..."
"Power...? You mean, time travel?"
"Precisely. The power to repeat one's own time... back to moment that [Profound Darkness] revived."
"That's probably as far as they could go, shouldering [Profound Darkness] and its colossal amount of photons..."
"But this was effective enough to bind it to that exact point in time."
"Sadly, all this did was turn back time. [Profound Darkness] will inevitably manifest here again."
"...And once again, <%me> and the other ARKS will fight, weaken it, and..."
"...[Persona] will return to the moment of its revival. Repeatedly... endlessly... eternally..."
"You mean they'll be trapped within that cycle? Forever and ever...?"
"That's... too cruel! ...We have to find a way to save them, <%me>!!"
"1. Is there nothing we can do?"
"2. This can't be sustainable forever..."
"Even the mighty Photoners could do little more than seal it away."
"It frustrates me to admit it... but as of this time, it's all we have."
"Indeed... That fear is quite real."
"We have no way of knowing how long this cycle can last."
"Things worked out this time, but the next time? The following? 10 cycles from now? No one knows."
"Even if I overclocked these calculations, there's no guarantee I could come up with a solution."
"At the very least, [Persona] and Xion have bought us time."
"Our future may have very well been one where the galaxy is devoured, with no escape..."
"...but those two saw to it not becoming reality."
"We must not waste this chance. There must be an answer somewhere."
"...Yeah. It'll all work out! Definitely! Right, <%me>?"
"You were able to help me--you saved me! That counts for something!"
"I'm sure the answer is just ahead. You and Xiao made this future possible, after all."
"...So if you two are listening, hang in there! We'll save you soon!"
